name: Cillian Murphy
description: Acclaimed Irish actor known for his roles in Inception, Peaky Blinders, and The Dark Knight Trilogy.

content.title: Biography
content.body: Cillian Murphy was born on May 25, 1976, in Douglas, Cork, Ireland. He began his career in music as a lead singer and guitarist for a rock band before moving into acting. His acting career started with stage productions and short films in the late 1990s.

content.title: Career
content.body: Cillian Murphy gained international recognition for his performance as Jim in **28 Days Later** (2002). He is renowned for his versatility and ability to portray complex characters. His notable works include portraying Dr. Jonathan Crane/Scarecrow in **The Dark Knight Trilogy** and starring as Thomas Shelby in the television series **Peaky Blinders**. Murphy has worked extensively with director Christopher Nolan, featuring in films such as **Inception** (2010) and **Dunkirk** (2017).

content.title: Notable Collaborations
content.body: Murphy has frequently collaborated with director Christopher Nolan, appearing in **The Dark Knight Trilogy**, **Inception**, and **Dunkirk**. He has also co-starred with actors like Tom Hardy and Michael Caine.

content.title: Legacy
content.body: Cillian Murphy is known for his intense performances and has been nominated for and received numerous awards throughout his career. His roles have left a significant impact on both film and television, solidifying him as a prominent actor in contemporary cinema.
